purpose: To provide a directory and coordination platform for agents using the Agent2Agent protocol
principle: Utilizes the A2A protocol to enable communication and coordination between different agent systems
reusability: Designed to be a plug-and-play solution for developers implementing the A2A protocol, offering extensibility and integration with existing agent systems
limitations: Limited to environments supporting the A2A protocol; primarily experimental with potential instability
